item.title: 2020 Lago Cerqueira
item.description: First tried at Puck’s Douro Valley Red is a blend of Tinta Barroca, Tinta Roriz, Touriga Franca, Touriga Nacional Red Wine Red Blend Portugal 6 months in french oak Works well with food or stand-alone
item.content:encoded:
First tried at Puck’s

Douro Valley Red is a blend of Tinta Barroca, Tinta Roriz, Touriga Franca, Touriga Nacional

Red Wine

Red Blend

Portugal

6 months in french oak

Works well with food or stand-alone

Soft tannins

Full-flavor without being heavy

Fruity

Fermented Fruit juices that’s not sweet.

Easy Drinking
